channel.title: Assassin in the Palace 3 : The Return [1/9] King and his guards win!
channel.description:
## [color=blue]Welcome![/color] **I am Memesky and my co-host is @psychoneirik i hope you enjoy this game :wink:**
## What is Assassin in the palace? It's a gamemode in which one player is a king and majority are his guards. There is 1 assassin who can attempt to kill the king at any time. And if he kills king he wins,and if he doesn't king and guards win.
## [color=green]Rules[/color] https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515 - Assassin can only kill after he gets executed
## **Roles**
>## [color=blue]The King[/color] >You are the king! Your guards know you but you don't know them! Make sure your true identity is not revealed to the assassin as your survival is needed for victory. **Goal** : Lynch the assassin without dying.
>## [color=green]The Guard[/color] You are a guard to the beloved king [PlayerName] lynch the assassin and make sure he doesn't learn king's identity or you are at high risk of losing. **Goal**: Lynch the assassin without the king dying.
>## [color=red]The Assassin[/color] You are the assassin! You have one shot at killing the king which you can use at any time! **Goal** : Kill the king
## [color=purple]Executions[/color] You can vote a player with /vote PlayerName,after majority was reached the player will die
## [color=red]Rolelist[/color] [color=blue]The King[/color] [color=green]Guard[/color] [color=green]Guard[/color] [color=green]Guard[/color] [color=green]Guard[/color] [color=green]Guard[/color] [color=green]Guard[/color] [color=green]Guard[/color] [color=red]Assassin[/color]
Players :
1. MtheJoker - [color=blue]The King[/color] - Only survivor 2. Firekitten - [color=green]Rebel[/color] - Second execution 3. Hippolytus - [color=green]Rebel[/color] - Sixth execution 4. CheesyKnives - [color=green]Rebel[/color] - Stabbed by htm 5. htm - [color=red]Assassin[/color] - Seventh execution 6. Marluxion - [color=green]Rebel[/color] - Fifth execution 7. Celeste_Ludenberg - [color=green]Rebel[/color] - First execution 8. Whammerist - [color=green]Rebel[/color] - Fourth execution 9. NuclearBuritto - [color=green]Rebel[/color] - Third execution
Backups:
1. Twil1ight 2. MaximusPrime 3. 4. 5.
